Pull request merge from arthurmensch/nilearn:mpl_2 to nilearn/nilearn:master

text: Looks good to merge once the LooseVersion thing is addressed.
You did a typo in the current code: "__version__" not "version". The tests are all failing :)
The code seems broken under MPL 1.4. Check out travis.
